And <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G2564>called,<s%> and his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> to the <S%G1062>marriage.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G1135>Woman,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> have I to do with you? <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> is not <S%G3768>yet<s%> come. <S%G2240><s%>
His <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G1249>servants,<s%> <S%G3748>Whatever<s%> <S%G302><s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to you, <S%G4160>do<s%> it.

And there were <S%G2749>set<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> water <S%G5201>pots<s%> of <S%G3035>stone,<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the manner of the <S%G2512>purifying<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G5562>containing<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3355>firkins<s%> <S%G303>apiece.<s%>
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1072>Fill<s%> the water <S%G5201>pots<s%> with water. <S%G5204><s%> And they <S%G1072>filled<s%> them up to the <S%G507>brim.<s%>
And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G501>Draw<s%> out <S%G3568>now,<s%> and <S%G5342>bear<s%> to the <S%G755>governor<s%> of the feast. <S%G755><s%> And they <S%G5342>bore<s%> it.

<S%G5613>When<s%> the <S%G755>ruler<s%> of the <S%G755>feast<s%> had <S%G1089>tasted<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> that was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G3631>wine,<s%> and <S%G1492>knew<s%> not from <S%G4159>where<s%> it was: (but the <S%G1249>servants<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G501>drew<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G1492>knew;<s%>) the <S%G755>governor<s%> of the <S%G755>feast<s%> <S%G5455>called<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom,<s%>

And <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4412>at<s%> the <S%G4412>beginning<s%> does <S%G5087>set<s%> <S%G5087>forth<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3631>wine;<s%> and <S%G3752>when<s%> men have <S%G3184>well<s%> <S%G3184>drunk,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> that which is <S%G1640>worse:<s%> but you have <S%G5083>kept<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G737>now.<s%>

<S%G5026>This<s%> <S%G746>beginning<s%> of <S%G4592>miracles<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> in <S%G2580>Cana<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and <S%G5319>manifested<s%> <S%G5319>forth<s%> his <S%G1391>glory;<s%> and his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> him.

<S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> he <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to <S%G2584>Capernaum,<s%> he, and his <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and his <S%G80>brothers,<s%> and his <S%G3101>disciples:<s%> and they <S%G3306>continued<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> not <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>
And the <S%G2453>Jews'<s%> <S%G3957>passover<s%> was <S%G1451>at<s%> <S%G1451>hand,<s%> and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%G2147>found<s%> in the <S%G2411>temple<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> that <S%G4453>sold<s%> <S%G1016>oxen<s%> and <S%G4263>sheep<s%> and doves, and the <S%G2773>changers<s%> of <S%G2773>money<s%> <S%G2521>sitting:<s%>

And when he had <S%G4160>made<s%> a <S%G5416>whip<s%> of <S%G4979>small<s%> <S%G4979>cords,<s%> he <S%G1544>drove<s%> them <S%G3956>all<s%> out of the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> and the <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> and the <S%G1016>oxen;<s%> and <S%G1632>poured<s%> out the <S%G2855>changers'<s%> <S%G2772>money,<s%> and <S%G390>overthrew<s%> the <S%G5132>tables;<s%>

And <S%G2036>said<s%> to them that <S%G4453>sold<s%> <S%G4058>doves,<s%> <S%G142>Take<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G1782>hence;<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> not my <S%G3962>Father's<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> an <S%G3624>house<s%> of merchandise. <S%G1712><s%>
And his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3415>remembered<s%> that it was <S%G1125>written,<s%> The <S%G2205>zeal<s%> of <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> has <S%G2719>eaten<s%> me up.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> <S%G1166>show<s%> you to us, seeing that you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things?

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G3089>Destroy<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G3485>temple,<s%> and in <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> I will <S%G1453>raise<s%> it up.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G5062>Forty<s%> and <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> was <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3485>temple<s%> in <S%G3618>building,<s%> and will you <S%G1453>raise<s%> it up in <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days?<s%>
But he <S%G3004>spoke<s%> of the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of his <S%G4983>body.<s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> he was <S%G1453>risen<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3415>remembered<s%> that he had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> to them; and they <S%G4100>believed<s%> the <S%G1124>scripture,<s%> and the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G2036>said.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> he was in <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G3957>passover,<s%> in the <S%G1859>feast<s%> day, <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> in his <S%G3686>name,<s%> when they <S%G2334>saw<s%> the <S%G4592>miracles<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G4160>did.<s%>
But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> did not <S%G4100>commit<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> to them, <S%G1223>because<s%> he <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men,
